assessment_item.title: 7SMXJ1-Q27-______ என்பது ஒரு பொதுவான நோசோகோமியல் தொற்று.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

_______ என்பது ஒரு பொதுவான நோசோகோமியல் தொற்று.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

தோல் தொற்றுகள்          

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1660"},{"text":"

சுவாச நிமோனியா

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1661"},{"text":"

காற்று தொற்றுகள்         

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1671"},{"text":"

இவை அனைத்தும்
